name: eldorajob
tag_list: job, hr, solution, app, talent, intelligence, matching, map, candidate, business, recruitement, jobboard
overview:
Talent Management Intelligence

30x faster, 100x more accurate than most of jobboards.

Eldorajob solves the challenge of speed and rightness in the talent matching industry.

We believe that effective recruitment cannot solely rely on regular job posting schemes, which often generate an excess of unqualified and unsatisfactory results, even complemented with semantic tools.

Our solution is scalable and suits small, medium and large public, private or governmental entities like global multinationals, unemployment offices or pure recruitment groups and placement agencies.

Hiring will never be the same.
